H

HikariCPExtension - Class in org.microbean.datasource.cdi.hikaricp
An Extension that arranges for injection points of type DataSource qualified with Named to be satisfied with HikariDataSource instances.
HikariCPExtension() - Constructor for class org.microbean.datasource.cdi.hikaricp.HikariCPExtension
Creates a new HikariCPExtension.

O

org.microbean.datasource.cdi.hikaricp - package org.microbean.datasource.cdi.hikaricp
Provides classes and interfaces for integrating the Hikari connection pool implementation into a standalone CDI 2.0 environment.
